quotes: Making that bread, but make it sustainable 🌱
Securing the bag isn't just a hobby, it's self-care 💅
Your finances don't have to pass the vibe check to get better 📈
Plot twist: You're about to be good with money 💸
Living that budget life, no cap fr fr ✨
Main character energy is managing your money 💫
We eating good AND saving good 🍜
Bestie, your money journey starts here ✌️
This is your villain era of crushing debt 😈
FullScreenLoader.initialQuote: We eating good AND saving good 🍜

install.title: Install Our App

description.default: For the best experience, we recommend adding the shettayyy app to your home screen!

ios.title: To install this app on iOS:

steps.1: Tap the Share button in Safari
steps.2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

ios.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

android.step1: Tap the menu button in your browser
android.step2: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"

install.learnMore: Learn more about installing the app

installGuide.title: Install App Guide
installGuide.description: Follow these video guides to install our app on your device. Select your platform to see relevant instructions.
installGuide.noGuides: No installation guides available for the selected platform.
